name: Makeup Artist - Beauty Salon
description:
Step into the wonderful & crazy world of Beauty with Makeup Artist - Beauty Salon. Inspired by glitter, glamour and everything in between, feast your eyes on beautiful MakeUp & Hair looks, learn the basic skills in your own beauty studio and try your hand at a plethora of simple, editorial, glamorous and fashionistas makeup looks that will push you forward in the stylish world until you will become a legend! Next generation of makeup games has an absolutely new concept - create a MakeUp look for all!

Join a huge community of millions makeup experts & beauty enthusiasts around the world. Download Makeup Artist - Beauty Salon now and build your beauty studio start creating a fashion look without borders - for girls, boys, women and men!

From the makers of ‘International Fashion Stylist’ and ‘Super Wedding Stylist’ comes an all new concept that highlights every fashionista no matter who is girl or boy, woman or man obsession with flawless, gorgeous and crazy beauty looks. Become a Real Makeup Artist by creating makeup and hair looks of all kinds - Simple, Glamorous, Slick & Editorial and Crazy & Creative!

Make up savvy business women, models, TV divas, stylish girls, rising social media influencers and more! The makeup game never ends..

Style men & women with glamorous & creative makeup looks with Makeup Artist - Beauty Salon Complete the makeup looks with glorious hairstyles, backgrounds and frames to create a lovely makeup post to upload to your feed!

GET SET! GET GLAM!

Do you love beauty, makeup and style designer games?

Gameplay:
• Makeup Masterclass mode - you choose the fashion events and put together a makeup and beauty look to create the perfect makeover for your customer! Makeup top models, business tycoons & social media stars in glamorous hair and makeup, add beauty accessories & jewels to their face, and choose the perfect background.
• Face-Off Challenges mode - you’ll compete 1-ON-1 with other aspiring Makeup Artists to put together a glamorous beauty look! Become a top makeup artist & beauty influencer and get recognition for your makeup skills as you win your beauty battles!!
• Check-in daily to collect your Daily Reward - giving you the extra fashion & style budget you need on your way to becoming a super stylist & fashion designer in our fun dress up games!
• Get rewarded for each fabulous makeup look you submit - collect Coins & Diamonds so that you can add the hottest beauty items & elements to your super fleek Makeup Bag and progress to your next makeup customer!
• International Makeup Artist is a great way to play beauty & makeup games for kids & adults who love glamor, glitter and extravaganza.

The game is available in English US, Spanish, Arabic, French, German, Turkish, Italian, Russian and Portuguese

Start your career as a MakeUp Artist NOW!

Download! Makeup Artist - Beauty Salon to become a Beauty & Makeup Magician - International Makeup Artist is also a fun & creative game for adults with our high-quality graphics and an exciting variety of events and makeup concepts!

Looking for makeup games for free? We’ve gotcha covered - this cool makeup & glamor game for adults and teens has a range of beautiful eyeliner, eye shadow, lashes, lipstick finishes, jewelry and face accessories for hours of fun!
